extension.name: Debug Devkit
extension.description: The Debug Devkit allows a developer to preview the XML of a Frontend page. It also includes the page parameters, included XSL templates and provides a navigation for other Devkit extensions (such as the Profile Devkit)

releases.release: - Update Bitter library for improving syntax highlighting - Add Italian language - Add Russian language
- Add `?debug=raw` mode that outputs the page XML as raw XML - Fix indentation issues - Minor tweaks to CSS for better consistency - Update path to use `SYPMHONY_URL` constant
- Adding arrays to the param pool no longer breaks debug view
